item.title: About Peritz
item.description: About Me Who am I? I am Peritz. If you’re confused, here is a photo: I am a security professional and privacy enthusiast with experience and knowledge in pentesting, development, and administration of cloud infrastructure, web applications, Linux applications, container technology, and a whole load of other stuff. I’ve also got my own non-technical hobbies, but this is that kind of space. What’s this blog thing for then? I’ve been a keen advocate for security and privacy in my personal life for a long time.
